<p>ç»™ä½ ä¸€ä¸ªå˜é‡å¯¹æ•°ç»„ <code>equations</code> å’Œä¸€ä¸ªå®æ•°å€¼æ•°ç»„ <code>values</code> ä½œä¸ºå·²çŸ¥æ¡ä»¶ï¼Œå…¶ä¸­ <code>equations[i] = [A<sub>i</sub>, B<sub>i</sub>]</code> å’Œ <code>values[i]</code> å…±åŒè¡¨ç¤ºç­‰å¼ <code>A<sub>i</sub> / B<sub>i</sub> = values[i]</code> ã€‚æ¯ä¸ª <code>A<sub>i</sub></code> æˆ– <code>B<sub>i</sub></code> æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªè¡¨ç¤ºå•ä¸ªå˜é‡çš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ã€‚</p>

<p>å¦æœ‰ä¸€äº›ä»¥æ•°ç»„ <code>queries</code> è¡¨ç¤ºçš„é—®é¢˜ï¼Œå…¶ä¸­ <code>queries[j] = [C<sub>j</sub>, D<sub>j</sub>]</code> è¡¨ç¤ºç¬¬ <code>j</code> ä¸ªé—®é¢˜ï¼Œè¯·ä½ æ ¹æ®å·²çŸ¥æ¡ä»¶æ‰¾å‡º <code>C<sub>j</sub> / D<sub>j</sub> = ?</code> çš„ç»“æœä½œä¸ºç­”æ¡ˆã€‚</p>

<p>è¿”å› <strong>æ‰€æœ‰é—®é¢˜çš„ç­”æ¡ˆ</strong> ã€‚å¦‚æœå­˜åœ¨æŸä¸ªæ— æ³•ç¡®å®šçš„ç­”æ¡ˆï¼Œåˆ™ç”¨ <code>-1.0</code> æ›¿ä»£è¿™ä¸ªç­”æ¡ˆã€‚å¦‚æœé—®é¢˜ä¸­å‡ºç°äº†ç»™å®šçš„å·²çŸ¥æ¡ä»¶ä¸­æ²¡æœ‰å‡ºç°çš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼Œä¹Ÿéœ€è¦ç”¨ <code>-1.0</code> æ›¿ä»£è¿™ä¸ªç­”æ¡ˆã€‚</p>

<p><strong>æ³¨æ„ï¼š</strong>è¾“å…¥æ€»æ˜¯æœ‰æ•ˆçš„ã€‚ä½ å¯ä»¥å‡è®¾é™¤æ³•è¿ç®—ä¸­ä¸ä¼šå‡ºç°é™¤æ•°ä¸º 0 çš„æƒ…å†µï¼Œä¸”ä¸å­˜åœ¨ä»»ä½•çŸ›ç›¾çš„ç»“æœã€‚</p>

<p><strong>æ³¨æ„ï¼š</strong>æœªåœ¨ç­‰å¼åˆ—è¡¨ä¸­å‡ºç°çš„å˜é‡æ˜¯æœªå®šä¹‰çš„ï¼Œå› æ­¤æ— æ³•ç¡®å®šå®ƒä»¬çš„ç­”æ¡ˆã€‚</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong class="example">ç¤ºä¾‹ 1ï¼š</strong></p>

<pre>
<strong>è¾“å…¥ï¼š</strong>equations = [["a","b"],["b","c"]], values = [2.0,3.0], queries = [["a","c"],["b","a"],["a","e"],["a","a"],["x","x"]]
<strong>è¾“å‡ºï¼š</strong>[6.00000,0.50000,-1.00000,1.00000,-1.00000]
<strong>è§£é‡Šï¼š</strong>
æ¡ä»¶ï¼š<em>a / b = 2.0</em>, <em>b / c = 3.0</em>
é—®é¢˜ï¼š<em>a / c = ?</em>, <em>b / a = ?</em>, <em>a / e = ?</em>, <em>a / a = ?</em>, <em>x / x = ?</em>
ç»“æœï¼š[6.0, 0.5, -1.0, 1.0, -1.0 ]
æ³¨æ„ï¼šx æ˜¯æœªå®šä¹‰çš„ =&gt; -1.0</pre>

<p><strong class="example">ç¤ºä¾‹ 2ï¼š</strong></p>

<pre>
<strong>è¾“å…¥ï¼š</strong>equations = [["a","b"],["b","c"],["bc","cd"]], values = [1.5,2.5,5.0], queries = [["a","c"],["c","b"],["bc","cd"],["cd","bc"]]
<strong>è¾“å‡ºï¼š</strong>[3.75000,0.40000,5.00000,0.20000]
</pre>

<p><strong class="example">ç¤ºä¾‹ 3ï¼š</strong></p>

<pre>
<strong>è¾“å…¥ï¼š</strong>equations = [["a","b"]], values = [0.5], queries = [["a","b"],["b","a"],["a","c"],["x","y"]]
<strong>è¾“å‡ºï¼š</strong>[0.50000,2.00000,-1.00000,-1.00000]
</pre>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>æç¤ºï¼š</strong></p>

<ul> 
 <li><code>1 &lt;= equations.length &lt;= 20</code></li> 
 <li><code>equations[i].length == 2</code></li> 
 <li><code>1 &lt;= A<sub>i</sub>.length, B<sub>i</sub>.length &lt;= 5</code></li> 
 <li><code>values.length == equations.length</code></li> 
 <li><code>0.0 &lt; values[i] &lt;= 20.0</code></li> 
 <li><code>1 &lt;= queries.length &lt;= 20</code></li> 
 <li><code>queries[i].length == 2</code></li> 
 <li><code>1 &lt;= C<sub>j</sub>.length, D<sub>j</sub>.length &lt;= 5</code></li> 
 <li><code>A<sub>i</sub>, B<sub>i</sub>, C<sub>j</sub>, D<sub>j</sub></code> ç”±å°å†™è‹±æ–‡å­—æ¯ä¸æ•°å­—ç»„æˆ</li> 
</ul>

<details><summary><strong>Related Topics</strong></summary>æ·±åº¦ä¼˜å…ˆæœç´¢ | å¹¿åº¦ä¼˜å…ˆæœç´¢ | å¹¶æŸ¥é›† | å›¾ | æ•°ç»„ | å­—ç¬¦ä¸² | æœ€çŸ­è·¯</details><br>

<div>ğŸ‘ 1130, ğŸ‘ 0<span style='float: right;'><span style='color: gray;'><a href='https://github.com/labuladong/fucking-algorithm/issues' target='_blank' style='color: lightgray;text-decoration: underline;'>bug åé¦ˆ</a> | <a href='https://labuladong.online/algo/fname.html?fname=jbæ’ä»¶ç®€ä»‹' target='_blank' style='color: lightgray;text-decoration: underline;'>ä½¿ç”¨æŒ‡å—</a> | <a href='https://labuladong.online/algo/' target='_blank' style='color: lightgray;text-decoration: underline;'>æ›´å¤šé…å¥—æ’ä»¶</a></span></span></div>

<div id="labuladong"><hr>

**é€šçŸ¥ï¼šç½‘ç«™æ–°å¢å¤§é‡ä¹ é¢˜ï¼Œæ–°å¢æ’åºç®—æ³•ä¸“é¢˜åŠå¯è§†åŒ–ï¼Œå…·ä½“è¯·æŸ¥çœ‹ [ç½‘ç«™æ›´æ–°æ—¥å¿—](https://labuladong.online/algo/changelog/website/)~**

<details><summary><strong>labuladong æ€è·¯</strong></summary>

<div id="labuladong_solution_zh">

## åŸºæœ¬æ€è·¯

è¿™é“é¢˜è¯´ç™½äº†å°±æ˜¯è€ƒä½  [æœ‰å‘åŠ æƒå›¾](https://labuladong.online/algo/data-structure-basic/graph-basic/) çš„éå†ã€‚

`a/b=2` å°±ç›¸å½“äºå¾€å›¾ä¸­æ·»åŠ äº†ä¸€æ¡ `a->b` æƒå€¼ä¸º 2 çš„è¾¹ï¼ŒåŒæ—¶æ·»åŠ ä¸€æ¡ `b->a` æƒå€¼ä¸º 1/2 çš„è¾¹ã€‚

`queries` é—®ä½  `x/y` çš„å€¼ï¼Œç›¸å½“äºå°±æ˜¯å›¾ä¸­æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨ä¸€æ¡ä» `x` åˆ° `y` çš„è·¯å¾„ï¼Œå¦‚æœæœ‰ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆè·¯å¾„ä¸Šæ‰€æœ‰è¾¹çš„æƒå€¼ç›¸ä¹˜å°±æ˜¯ `x/y` çš„å€¼ã€‚

æ‰€ä»¥æ€è·¯å°±å¾ˆç®€å•äº†ï¼Œç”¨é‚»æ¥è¡¨å»ºå›¾ï¼Œç„¶åç”¨ DFS æˆ–è€… BFS éå†å³å¯ï¼Œæˆ‘è¿™é‡Œå°±ç”¨ BFS å§ã€‚

- **è¯¦ç»†é¢˜è§£**ï¼š
  - [ã€å¼ºåŒ–ç»ƒä¹ ã€‘BFS ç»å…¸ä¹ é¢˜ II](https://labuladong.online/algo/problem-set/bfs-ii/)

</div>

<div id="solution">

## è§£æ³•ä»£ç 



<div class="tab-panel"><div class="tab-nav">
<button data-tab-item="cpp" class="tab-nav-button btn " data-tab-group="default" onclick="switchTab(this)">cppğŸ¤–</button>

<button data-tab-item="python" class="tab-nav-button btn " data-tab-group="default" onclick="switchTab(this)">pythonğŸ¤–</button>

<button data-tab-item="java" class="tab-nav-button btn active" data-tab-group="default" onclick="switchTab(this)">javağŸŸ¢</button>

<button data-tab-item="go" class="tab-nav-button btn " data-tab-group="default" onclick="switchTab(this)">goğŸ¤–</button>

<button data-tab-item="javascript" class="tab-nav-button btn " data-tab-group="default" onclick="switchTab(this)">javascriptğŸ¤–</button>
</div><div class="tab-content">
<div data-tab-item="cpp" class="tab-item " data-tab-group="default"><div class="highlight">

```cpp
// æ³¨æ„ï¼šcpp ä»£ç ç”± chatGPTğŸ¤– æ ¹æ®æˆ‘çš„ java ä»£ç ç¿»è¯‘ã€‚
// æœ¬ä»£ç çš„æ­£ç¡®æ€§å·²é€šè¿‡åŠ›æ‰£éªŒè¯ï¼Œå¦‚æœ‰ç–‘é—®ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å¯¹ç…§æˆ‘çš„ java ä»£ç æŸ¥çœ‹ã€‚

class Solution {
    struct Edge {
        std::string node;
        double weight;

        Edge(std::string node, double weight) {
            this->node = node;
            this->weight = weight;
        }
    };

public:
    std::vector<double> calcEquation(std::vector<std::vector<std::string>>& equations, std::vector<double>& values,
                                     std::vector<std::vector<std::string>>& queries) {
        // æŠŠ equations æŠ½è±¡æˆä¸€å¹…å›¾ï¼Œé‚»æ¥è¡¨å­˜å‚¨
        std::unordered_map<std::string, std::vector<Edge>> graph;
        for (int i = 0; i < equations.size(); ++i) {
            std::vector<std::string>& equation = equations[i];
            std::string a = equation[0], b = equation[1];
            double w = values[i];
            // æ„å»ºåŒå‘å›¾
            if (graph.find(a) == graph.end()) {
                graph[a] = std::vector<Edge>();
            }
            graph[a].emplace_back(b, w);
            if (graph.find(b) == graph.end()) {
                graph[b] = std::vector<Edge>();
            }
            graph[b].emplace_back(a, 1.0 / w);
        }

        std::vector<double> res(queries.size());
        for (int i = 0; i < queries.size(); ++i) {
            std::vector<std::string>& query = queries[i];
            std::string start = query[0], end = query[1];
            // BFS éå†å›¾ï¼Œè®¡ç®— start åˆ° end çš„è·¯å¾„ä¹˜ç§¯
            res[i] = bfs(graph, start, end);
        }
        return res;
    }

private:
    double bfs(std::unordered_map<std::string, std::vector<Edge>>& graph, std::string start, std::string end) {
        if (graph.find(start) == graph.end() || graph.find(end) == graph.end()) {
            // ä¸å­˜åœ¨çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œè‚¯å®šæ— æ³•åˆ°è¾¾
            return -1.0;
        }
        if (start == end) {
            return 1.0;
        }

        // BFS æ ‡å‡†æ¡†æ¶
        std::queue<std::string> queue;
        std::unordered_set<std::string> visited;
        queue.push(start);
        visited.insert(start);

        // key ä¸ºèŠ‚ç‚¹ IDï¼ˆå˜é‡åï¼‰ï¼Œvalue è®°å½•ä» start åˆ°è¯¥èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„è·¯å¾„ä¹˜ç§¯
        std::unordered_map<std::string, double> weight;
        weight[start] = 1.0;

        while (!queue.empty()) {
            std::string cur = queue.front();
            queue.pop();
            for (Edge& neighbor : graph[cur]) {
                if (visited.find(neighbor.node) != visited.end()) {
                    continue;
                }
                // æ›´æ–°è·¯å¾„ä¹˜ç§¯
                weight[neighbor.node] = weight[cur] * neighbor.weight;
                if (neighbor.node == end) {
                    return weight[end];
                }
                // è®°å½• visited
                visited.insert(neighbor.node);
                // æ–°èŠ‚ç‚¹åŠ å…¥é˜Ÿåˆ—ç»§ç»­éå†
                queue.push(neighbor.node);
            }
        }
        return -1.0;
    }
};
```

</div></div>

<div data-tab-item="python" class="tab-item " data-tab-group="default"><div class="highlight">

```python
# æ³¨æ„ï¼špython ä»£ç ç”± chatGPTğŸ¤– æ ¹æ®æˆ‘çš„ java ä»£ç ç¿»è¯‘ã€‚
# æœ¬ä»£ç çš„æ­£ç¡®æ€§å·²é€šè¿‡åŠ›æ‰£éªŒè¯ï¼Œå¦‚æœ‰ç–‘é—®ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å¯¹ç…§æˆ‘çš„ java ä»£ç æŸ¥çœ‹ã€‚

class Solution:

    class Edge:
        def __init__(self, node: str, weight: float):
            self.node = node
            self.weight = weight

    def calcEquation(self, equations: List[List[str]], values: List[float], queries: List[List[str]]) -> List[float]:
        # æŠŠ equations æŠ½è±¡æˆä¸€å¹…å›¾ï¼Œé‚»æ¥è¡¨å­˜å‚¨
        graph = {}
        for i in range(len(equations)):
            equation = equations[i]
            a, b = equation[0], equation[1]
            w = values[i]
            # æ„å»ºåŒå‘å›¾
            if a not in graph:
                graph[a] = []
            graph[a].append(self.Edge(b, w))
            if b not in graph:
                graph[b] = []
            graph[b].append(self.Edge(a, 1.0 / w))

        res = [0.0] * len(queries)
        for i in range(len(queries)):
            query = queries[i]
            start, end = query[0], query[1]
            # BFS éå†å›¾ï¼Œè®¡ç®— start åˆ° end çš„è·¯å¾„ä¹˜ç§¯
            res[i] = self.bfs(graph, start, end)
        return res

    def bfs(self, graph: dict, start: str, end: str) -> float:
        if start not in graph or end not in graph:
            # ä¸å­˜åœ¨çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œè‚¯å®šæ— æ³•åˆ°è¾¾
            return -1.0
        if start == end:
            return 1.0

        # BFS æ ‡å‡†æ¡†æ¶
        queue = collections.deque([start])
        visited = set([start])

        # key ä¸ºèŠ‚ç‚¹ IDï¼ˆå˜é‡åï¼‰ï¼Œvalue è®°å½•ä» start åˆ°è¯¥èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„è·¯å¾„ä¹˜ç§¯
        weight = {start: 1.0}

        while queue:
            cur = queue.popleft()
            for neighbor in graph[cur]:
                if neighbor.node in visited:
                    continue
                # æ›´æ–°è·¯å¾„ä¹˜ç§¯
                weight[neighbor.node] = weight[cur] * neighbor.weight
                if neighbor.node == end:
                    return weight[end]
                # è®°å½• visited
                visited.add(neighbor.node)
                # æ–°èŠ‚ç‚¹åŠ å…¥é˜Ÿåˆ—ç»§ç»­éå†
                queue.append(neighbor.node)
        return -1.0
```

</div></div>

<div data-tab-item="java" class="tab-item active" data-tab-group="default"><div class="highlight">

```java
class Solution {

    class Edge {
        String node;
        double weight;

        Edge(String node, double weight) {
            this.node = node;
            this.weight = weight;
        }
    }

    public double[] calcEquation(List<List<String>> equations, double[] values,
                                 List<List<String>> queries) {
        // æŠŠ equations æŠ½è±¡æˆä¸€å¹…å›¾ï¼Œé‚»æ¥è¡¨å­˜å‚¨
        Map<String, List<Edge>> graph = new HashMap<>();
        for (int i = 0; i < equations.size(); i++) {
            List<String> equation = equations.get(i);
            String a = equation.get(0), b = equation.get(1);
            double w = values[i];
            // æ„å»ºåŒå‘å›¾
            if (!graph.containsKey(a)) {
                graph.put(a, new ArrayList<>());
            }
            graph.get(a).add(new Edge(b, w));
            if (!graph.containsKey(b)) {
                graph.put(b, new ArrayList<>());
            }
            graph.get(b).add(new Edge(a, 1.0 / w));
        }

        double[] res = new double[queries.size()];
        for (int i = 0; i < queries.size(); i++) {
            List<String> query = queries.get(i);
            String start = query.get(0), end = query.get(1);
            // BFS éå†å›¾ï¼Œè®¡ç®— start åˆ° end çš„è·¯å¾„ä¹˜ç§¯
            res[i] = bfs(graph, start, end);
        }
        return res;
    }

    double bfs(Map<String, List<Edge>> graph, String start, String end) {
        if (!graph.containsKey(start) || !graph.containsKey(end)) {
            // ä¸å­˜åœ¨çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œè‚¯å®šæ— æ³•åˆ°è¾¾
            return -1.0;
        }
        if (start.equals(end)) {
            return 1.0;
        }

        // BFS æ ‡å‡†æ¡†æ¶
        Queue<String> queue = new LinkedList<>();
        Set<String> visited = new HashSet<>();
        queue.offer(start);
        visited.add(start);

        // key ä¸ºèŠ‚ç‚¹ IDï¼ˆå˜é‡åï¼‰ï¼Œvalue è®°å½•ä» start åˆ°è¯¥èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„è·¯å¾„ä¹˜ç§¯
        Map<String, Double> weight = new HashMap<>();
        weight.put(start, 1.0);

        while (!queue.isEmpty()) {
            String cur = queue.poll();
            for (Edge neighbor : graph.get(cur)) {
                if (visited.contains(neighbor.node)) {
                    continue;
                }
                // æ›´æ–°è·¯å¾„ä¹˜ç§¯
                weight.put(neighbor.node, weight.get(cur) * neighbor.weight);
                if (neighbor.node.equals(end)) {
                    return weight.get(end);
                }
                // è®°å½• visited
                visited.add(neighbor.node);
                // æ–°èŠ‚ç‚¹åŠ å…¥é˜Ÿåˆ—ç»§ç»­éå†
                queue.offer(neighbor.node);
            }
        }
        return -1.0;
    }
}
```

</div></div>

<div data-tab-item="go" class="tab-item " data-tab-group="default"><div class="highlight">

```go
// æ³¨æ„ï¼šgo ä»£ç ç”± chatGPTğŸ¤– æ ¹æ®æˆ‘çš„ java ä»£ç ç¿»è¯‘ã€‚
// æœ¬ä»£ç çš„æ­£ç¡®æ€§å·²é€šè¿‡åŠ›æ‰£éªŒè¯ï¼Œå¦‚æœ‰ç–‘é—®ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å¯¹ç…§æˆ‘çš„ java ä»£ç æŸ¥çœ‹ã€‚

type Edge struct {
    node   string
    weight float64
}

func calcEquation(equations [][]string, values []float64, queries [][]string) []float64 {
    // æŠŠ equations æŠ½è±¡æˆä¸€å¹…å›¾ï¼Œé‚»æ¥è¡¨å­˜å‚¨
    graph := make(map[string][]Edge)
    for i := 0; i < len(equations); i++ {
        equation := equations[i]
        a, b := equation[0], equation[1]
        w := values[i]
        // æ„å»ºåŒå‘å›¾
        if _, ok := graph[a]; !ok {
            graph[a] = []Edge{}
        }
        graph[a] = append(graph[a], Edge{b, w})
        if _, ok := graph[b]; !ok {
            graph[b] = []Edge{}
        }
        graph[b] = append(graph[b], Edge{a, 1.0 / w})
    }

    res := make([]float64, len(queries))
    for i, query := range queries {
        start, end := query[0], query[1]
        // BFS éå†å›¾ï¼Œè®¡ç®— start åˆ° end çš„è·¯å¾„ä¹˜ç§¯
        res[i] = bfs(graph, start, end)
    }
    return res
}

func bfs(graph map[string][]Edge, start string, end string) float64 {
    if _, ok := graph[start]; !ok {
        // ä¸å­˜åœ¨çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œè‚¯å®šæ— æ³•åˆ°è¾¾
        return -1.0
    }
    if _, ok := graph[end]; !ok {
        // ä¸å­˜åœ¨çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œè‚¯å®šæ— æ³•åˆ°è¾¾
        return -1.0
    }
    if start == end {
        return 1.0
    }

    // BFS æ ‡å‡†æ¡†æ¶
    queue := []string{start}
    visited := make(map[string]bool)
    visited[start] = true

    // key ä¸ºèŠ‚ç‚¹ IDï¼ˆå˜é‡åï¼‰ï¼Œvalue è®°å½•ä» start åˆ°è¯¥èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„è·¯å¾„ä¹˜ç§¯
    weight := make(map[string]float64)
    weight[start] = 1.0

    for len(queue) > 0 {
        cur := queue[0]
        queue = queue[1:]
        for _, neighbor := range graph[cur] {
            if visited[neighbor.node] {
                continue
            }
            // æ›´æ–°è·¯å¾„ä¹˜ç§¯
            weight[neighbor.node] = weight[cur] * neighbor.weight
            if neighbor.node == end {
                return weight[end]
            }
            // è®°å½• visited
            visited[neighbor.node] = true
            // æ–°èŠ‚ç‚¹åŠ å…¥é˜Ÿåˆ—ç»§ç»­éå†
            queue = append(queue, neighbor.node)
        }
    }
    return -1.0
}
```

</div></div>

<div data-tab-item="javascript" class="tab-item " data-tab-group="default"><div class="highlight">

```javascript
// æ³¨æ„ï¼šjavascript ä»£ç ç”± chatGPTğŸ¤– æ ¹æ®æˆ‘çš„ java ä»£ç ç¿»è¯‘ã€‚
// æœ¬ä»£ç çš„æ­£ç¡®æ€§å·²é€šè¿‡åŠ›æ‰£éªŒè¯ï¼Œå¦‚æœ‰ç–‘é—®ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å¯¹ç…§æˆ‘çš„ java ä»£ç æŸ¥çœ‹ã€‚

var calcEquation = function(equations, values, queries) {
    class Edge {
        constructor(node, weight) {
            this.node = node;
            this.weight = weight;
        }
    }

    // æŠŠ equations æŠ½è±¡æˆä¸€å¹…å›¾ï¼Œé‚»æ¥è¡¨å­˜å‚¨
    let graph = new Map();
    for (let i = 0; i < equations.length; i++) {
        let equation = equations[i];
        let a = equation[0], b = equation[1];
        let w = values[i];
        // æ„å»ºåŒå‘å›¾
        if (!graph.has(a)) {
            graph.set(a, []);
        }
        graph.get(a).push(new Edge(b, w));
        if (!graph.has(b)) {
            graph.set(b, []);
        }
        graph.get(b).push(new Edge(a, 1.0 / w));
    }

    let res = new Array(queries.length);
    for (let i = 0; i < queries.length; i++) {
        let query = queries[i];
        let start = query[0], end = query[1];
        // BFS éå†å›¾ï¼Œè®¡ç®— start åˆ° end çš„è·¯å¾„ä¹˜ç§¯
        res[i] = bfs(graph, start, end);
    }
    return res;
    
    function bfs(graph, start, end) {
        if (!graph.has(start) || !graph.has(end)) {
            // ä¸å­˜åœ¨çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œè‚¯å®šæ— æ³•åˆ°è¾¾
            return -1.0;
        }
        if (start === end) {
            return 1.0;
        }

        // BFS æ ‡å‡†æ¡†æ¶
        let queue = [];
        let visited = new Set();
        queue.push(start);
        visited.add(start);

        // key ä¸ºèŠ‚ç‚¹ IDï¼ˆå˜é‡åï¼‰ï¼Œvalue è®°å½•ä» start åˆ°è¯¥èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„è·¯å¾„ä¹˜ç§¯
        let weight = new Map();
        weight.set(start, 1.0);

        while (queue.length) {
            let cur = queue.shift();
            for (let neighbor of graph.get(cur)) {
                if (visited.has(neighbor.node)) {
                    continue;
                }
                // æ›´æ–°è·¯å¾„ä¹˜ç§¯
                weight.set(neighbor.node, weight.get(cur) * neighbor.weight);
                if (neighbor.node === end) {
                    return weight.get(end);
                }
                // è®°å½• visited
                visited.add(neighbor.node);
                // æ–°èŠ‚ç‚¹åŠ å…¥é˜Ÿåˆ—ç»§ç»­éå†
                queue.push(neighbor.node);
            }
        }
        return -1.0;
    }
};
```

</div></div>
</div></div>

<div id="iframe_evaluate-division"></div></div>
</details><hr /><br />
